manual.text: Spectre AMS Designer and Xcelium Simulator Mixed-Signal User Guide
manual.description: Describes the Virtuoso AMS Designer simulator and Xcelium Simulator with mixed-signal option that supports the Verilog-AMS, VHDL-AMS, and SystemVerilog-AMS language standards.
